summary: The implementation successfully addresses all five requirements. The Radar tab has been added to BottomNav between Driver and Beach tabs with proper internationalization, RadarScreen component has been created with location prop handling and empty state support, RadarMap integration is evident with playback controls and layer toggles, App.tsx has been wired to conditionally render RadarScreen when activeTab === 'radar', and the code shows proper tab switching logic. Translation strings are not visible in the truncated diff but the component usage in BottomNav shows t('nav.radar') which indicates the translation key exists.

hallucinated_features.description: RadarFrameModeToggle component with 'forecast' and 'past' mode switching functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request forecast vs. past mode toggle. The requirement is to display cloud and precipitation layers, not to implement temporal playback modes.

hallucinated_features.description: RadarPlaybackControls with play/pause/skip functionality and timeline slider
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request animation or playback controls for the radar visualization. The requirement is to display current cloud cover and precipitation, not animated sequences.

hallucinated_features.description: RadarAlertControls and RadarAlertBanner components for alert system
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals to not add radar-specific settings or configuration UI beyond what already exists. Alert controls are new UI elements not requested.
BuildRequest does not request any additional info panels for the radar screen. The requirement is focused on displaying the map visualization.

hallucinated_features.description: RadarOverlayStatus component for displaying overlay loading/error states
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request status indicators beyond the basic empty state when no location is available.
BuildRequest does not request forecast-specific labeling or UI elements.
